Apply the transformations described by <code>Config</code> and <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a></code> to <code>In</code> and writes the result into <code>Out</code>. <a href="#a55af853235c79ddae3c55b4670a825dd">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a></>}
  name={<><a href="#a19ff9cfed0ad17d7b4d3cde1c2b940f4">executeObjcopyOnIHex</a> (const CommonConfig &amp;Config, const ELFConfig &amp;ELFConfig, MemoryBuffer &amp;In, raw&#95;ostream &amp;Out)</>}>
Apply the transformations described by <code>Config</code> and <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a></code> to <code>In</code>, which must represent an IHex file, and writes the result into <code>Out</code>. <a href="#a19ff9cfed0ad17d7b4d3cde1c2b940f4">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a></>}
  name={<><a href="#ae86d4be0de6470d9b5ac070eaa69c41e">executeObjcopyOnRawBinary</a> (const CommonConfig &amp;Config, const ELFConfig &amp;ELFConfig, MemoryBuffer &amp;In, raw&#95;ostream &amp;Out)</>}>
Apply the transformations described by <code>Config</code> and <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a></code> to <code>In</code>, which is treated as a raw binary input, and writes the result into <code>Out</code>. <a href="#ae86d4be0de6470d9b5ac070eaa69c41e">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

### executeObjcopyOnBinary() {#a55af853235c79ddae3c55b4670a825dd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::objcopy::elf::executeObjcopyOnBinary (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/commonconfig">CommonConfig</a> &amp; Config, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a> &amp; ELFConfig, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/object/elfobjectfilebase">object::ELFObjectFileBase</a> &amp; In, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; Out)</>}>
Apply the transformations described by <code>Config</code> and <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a></code> to <code>In</code> and writes the result into <code>Out</code>.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
any <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> encountered whilst performing the operation.
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>

### executeObjcopyOnIHex() {#a19ff9cfed0ad17d7b4d3cde1c2b940f4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::objcopy::elf::executeObjcopyOnIHex (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/commonconfig">CommonConfig</a> &amp; Config, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a> &amp; ELFConfig, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">MemoryBuffer</a> &amp; In, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; Out)</>}>
Apply the transformations described by <code>Config</code> and <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a></code> to <code>In</code>, which must represent an IHex file, and writes the result into <code>Out</code>.

### executeObjcopyOnRawBinary() {#ae86d4be0de6470d9b5ac070eaa69c41e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::objcopy::elf::executeObjcopyOnRawBinary (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/commonconfig">CommonConfig</a> &amp; Config, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a> &amp; ELFConfig, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">MemoryBuffer</a> &amp; In, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; Out)</>}>
Apply the transformations described by <code>Config</code> and <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a></code> to <code>In</code>, which is treated as a raw binary input, and writes the result into <code>Out</code>.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
any <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> encountered whilst performing the operation.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/objcopy/include/llvm/objcopy/elf/elfobjcopy-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/objcopy/include/llvm/objcopy/elf/elfobjcopy-h">ELFObjcopy.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/objcopy/lib/objcopy/elf/elfobjcopy-cpp/#l01062">1062</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/objcopy/lib/objcopy/elf/elfobjcopy-cpp">ELFObjcopy.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
